group_1.textRight: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ehh?! That's iiit?!

group_1.textLeft: Indeed...that's it.

group_1.textRight: No way, can't you introduce yourself a bit more?!
Like hobbies, where you're from, anything like that...
I wanna know more about you, Asahi-chan!

group_1.textLeft: What a hassle this is...
There cannot possibly be anything of interest@regarding me, could there?
Well, I can discuss the details of hunting.

group_1.textRight: Alriiight!

group_1.textLeft: ...And thus, the finishing stab procedure is@extremely important
as to reduce suffering as much as possible.

group_1.textRight: ...The weight of a life...
I'm...going to put more effort into being thankful@for my meals from now on...

group_1.textLeft: That is a fine mindset.

group_1.textRight: And with that, it is just about the time to bring@things to a close.
...Say whaaat!
Wasn't this just all hunting talk?@I didn't get to hear aaanything!

group_1.textLeft: I tried imitating Chiharu-dono's crash course on@Yusurinbo Shogun...
But was that unwise?

group_1.textRight: D-darn it all~!
WAAAAH!@I'M SO CURIOUS!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Calm yourself, Charu.@What's gotten into you so suddenly?
She's right. Being noisy at night will upset the@neighbors.

group_1.textRight: S-sorry...@[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102601:motion_100][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]It's because of Asahi-chan's story!
During her introduction, all she talked about was@hunting, you know?!

group_1.textLeft: That was because she tried to match your@storytelling, Charu.

group_1.textRight: But she's not from the same branch family@we came from,

and her wish...I don't know what her hobbies are...@[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102601:eyeClose_1][chara:102601:motion_200][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_060.exp.json][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]I don't know aaanything about heeer!

group_1.textLeft: Ah, speaking of wish, I also forgot to speak about@mine, didn't I?
...Well, wishes are a sensitive topic for Diviners, so...
Forcing her to speak about it is not justifiable...

group_1.textRight: You're both right, but... Still, I'm kind of curious.

group_1.textLeft: ...Do you sense any malice?

group_1.textRight: Not at all...

group_1.textLeft: Ehh... Charu...@What in the world has gotten into you?
Asahi is going to be our comrade from now on, so@it is not okay to thoughtlessly pry into her life.

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah. It's just as you say, Shizuka-chan.
...But I want to know Asahi-chan, to be better@friends with her...
It's kind of eating me up...

group_1.textLeft: ...Then the three of us can have a sleepover tonight!

group_1.textRight: Ehh?!

group_1.textLeft: If we talk a lot, then that weight may be lifted from@your shoulders.

group_1.textRight: Huhu, that may be pleasant.@Almost like a field trip.
This is girl talk...I believe it is called?

group_1.textLeft: ...Garl tawk?
